posts.title: Life-Size E.T. Replica
posts.content: The real E.T. may have gone home but thanks to the life-size E.T. replica you’ll be able to continue the adventure with this out of this world friend. Whether it’s getting chased down by the government or grabbing a slushie from the gas station, there’s never a dull moment.

posts.title: Virtually Indestructible Pet Ball
posts.content: The virtually indestructible pet ball is the last toy you’ll every have to buy your over energized and destructive doggy. The ball is made from a hard non-toxic polyethylene plastic designed to stand up to old Rex’s sharp and relentless canines.

posts.title: Outdoor Light Up Cubes
posts.content: Set the mood with these trendy outdoor light up cubes. The perfect accessory for a modern backyard or patio, these rechargeable LED cubes are waterproof, hold up to three hundred pounds, and even come with a wireless remote control.

posts.title: Adulthood Is A Myth Book
posts.content: Adulthood Is Myth is a varied collection of hilarious and totally accurate short comics by Brooklyn-based artist Sarah Andersen that highlight the trials and tribulations of adulting in the everyday world. It is the ideal gift for anyone who’s not a motivated social snowflake.

posts.title: Iron Throne Room Playset
posts.content: Bring the Red Keep to life by recreating some of your favorite scenes using this Iron Throne room playset. The set is meticulously decorated to portray the Iron Throne with a stone backdrop and includes figures such as King Joffrey Baratheon.

posts.title: Motion Sensing Stick-Anywhere Nightlight
posts.content: Avoid accidents caused by limited visibility by outfitting your home with these motion-sensing stick-anywhere nightlights. The set includes three compact battery operated motion-sensing LED bulbs that automatically turn on and off when they sense nearby movement.

posts.title: Shower Beer Koozie
posts.content: Start your morning off right with a beer in the shower using the shower beer koozie. The koozie comes in every color under the sun and features large suction cup located at the back so your hands can remain free when you need to shampoo or soap up.

posts.title: 50 Ways To Eat Cock Cookbook
posts.content: Enjoy swallowing a variety of cock everyday by receiving some helpful tips from the “50 Ways To Eat Cock” cookbook. This holy grail of culinary literature will show you how to prepare cock so you can improve your doctor recommended level of protein intake.

posts.title: Connecting Water Mats
posts.content: Create a secluded island in the middle of your lake with nothing more than a few connecting water mats. These heavy duty mats are strong enough to support the weight of six adults and can be interconnected to create floating walkways ideal for boats.

posts.title: Ship In A Bottle Decanter
posts.content: Give your home bar some nautical flair by storing your prized spirits inside this ship in a bottle decanter. This gorgeous piece is brilliantly hand-blown by skilled artisans with intricate detailing and is outfitted with a stainless steel spigot and airtight glass stopper.

posts.title: Amp Shaped Key Hanger
posts.content: Hang your keys in true rockstar fashion by outfitting your home with one of these amp shaped key hangers. Each hanger is molded from 1/8 inch thick plastic in the shape of a guitar amplifier and lets you conveniently hang your keys in the jack port.

posts.title: iPhone Speaker Case
posts.content: Sharing your music with others is easier than ever when you encase your smartphone using this iPhone speaker case. The case comes with a 2900 mAh battery and a compact hi-fidelity speaker with 10 times the volume capabilities of standard iPhone speakers.
